timeline.bodyText: I removed the tables since they duplicate content. Alternatively we could keep the tables (maybe convert them to list tables) and remove the lists with the titles. I opted for removing the tables since the current setup has each property in the nav on the right .. which is quite nice
timeline.author: mosabua

timeline.message:
